name: Square
description: Integrate with Square to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Payments
tools.description: List Square payments with optional filters by date range, status, or location. Returns payment IDs, amounts, and statuses.

tools.name: Create Payment
tools.description: Create a payment in Square. Requires a source ID (e.g. nonce from a card) and an amount.

tools.name: List Customers
tools.description: List customers in Square. Optionally sort or paginate. Returns customer names, emails, and IDs.

tools.name: List Catalog
tools.description: List catalog objects in Square (items, categories, discounts, taxes). Returns object names, types, and IDs.

tools.name: Create Invoice
tools.description: Create an invoice in Square for a customer and order. Specify the location, payment request, and delivery method.

sandbox.label: Sandbox Mode
sandbox.description: Use Square sandbox environment for testing
